message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I take $60, you take $40.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still fair
Bob, my offer is still the best you'll get. The longer this goes on the less you get.  I'll take $65 and you get $35.
I'm willing to compromise, 52-48 is a good deal considering the inflation
Bob, the clock is ticking and your potential gains are shrinking. This is my final offer, take it or leave it: $70 for me, $30 for you.
We're running out of time, 50-50 is the fairest deal we can get at this point
